transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Swatika sir se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Accha good morning sir aapne concern mail pe kiya tha ki aapko cheeze sahi nahi aa rahi hai IndiaMART se mai baat kar raha hu sir not working properly karke aapne back maanga. Kya bol rahe ho sir aap do teen hafte se nahi chal raha tha itni baar phone karne ke bawajood bhi aap koi response nahi de rahe the.
Customer: [inaudible] phone kiya tha hamare jo account manager hai unse copy sir last baat hui thi matlab aapne unse baat kiya tha ki issue hua tha.
Executive: Jab unse to hua tha sir abhi kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi usne jo bheji thi hai na usko maine short kiya tha jab usne phone nahi uthaya uske baad maine IndiaMART ke number se phone kiya tha.
Executive: Accha sir dekho kya hota hai na Saturday Sunday sir hamara na week off hota hai to shayad us din aapne Saturday Sunday ko kiya hoga isliye unhone phone maybe nahi uthaya hoga baki aisa nahi hai sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Accha abhi kya dikkat aa raha hai sir Swatika sir bataiye.
Customer: Nahi koi dikkat nahi hai abhi.
Executive: Abhi buyleads vagera me sir kya matlab properly?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi nahi abhi sab theek hai.
Executive: Accha but ek cheez mujhe jaanna tha sir aapne koi buylead consume kiya hai recent me unpe kaisa feedback hai sir matlab buyer se baat hui hai sir to call receive hua hai buyer ka jaise aapne pure kesari cash aapne 100 pure Kashmiri saffron ki buylead consume ki thi Vikas naam tha buyer ka 1 gram chahiye tha inse baat hui thi sir aapki?
Customer: Nahi hamara khud ka pattern rehta hai hum khud buyer se contact karte hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Okay to abhi sir aapke hand se koi issue tha jispe hame kaam karna chahiye aapke liye bataiye sir ki haan sir kuch issue aa raha hai kuch buyleads me bataiye hum uske kaam karte hai agar kuch buyleads me ya call me inquiry me aapko koi bhi dikkat aa rahi hai bataiye sir usse kaam karke aapko dete hai usko resolve karke dete hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan ji sir?
Customer: [inaudible] kya bol rahe the aap?
Executive: Sir meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Mai ye keh raha hu sir ki abhi koi aapka sir feedback hai matlab kaam hamare liye ki haan sir kisi pe buylead pe koi issue aa raha hai ya call pe inquiry pe hum usse kaam karke de irrelevant nahi aa raha kuch bhi aapka feedback hai sir jisse aapne liya tha ki not working properly to uspe sir kuch kaam karne ke liye hamare liye hai to bataiye sir hum usko ek sahi karke aapko dete hai us cheez ko kya dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi bas ab chhod dijiye ab jab jo hoga tab to aapko ho gaya.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Maine ab aaj to kabhi aap uske liye maafi chahunga sir jaise aapne call kiya hua hai na sir Saturday ke din kya tha ya usse pehle kiya tha Saturday ke din hi kiya hua hai sir baki Saturday ko din hamara thoda weekend rehta hai to usme call receive nahi kar paye.
Customer: Aap suniye meri baat kyuki mai jyada [inaudible]
Customer: Vendor the na aapke IndiaMART par mai unki tarah nahi hu ki jo piche hi lag jao mai mera actually jab chal raha hai sahi to mai phone nahi karunga aapko lekin jab ye buylead ka section aapne 20 din ke liye band rakha aur season unhi dino me tha to fir kya hi banda kare.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekho buylead ka section aapko bata du humne band nahi kiya tha sir aapke hi nahi Jammu Kashmir se hame kaafi concern aaye the sir ki unka jo Jio aapka sir network Jio ka raha hoga sir Jio ke network me issue aa raha hai sir aap kisi bhi dusre network se use kiye hote sir IndiaMART chala hota aapko bolu to mai mail share kar du hamari team ne usko resolve kiya hai ab wo Jio ke sim se bhi chal raha hai aapka sir net kis cheez se chalta hai Jio se chalta hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to wo Jio ke hi sim me issue tha sir Jio ke network issues hota IndiaMART ke alawa 10 12 app aise the ki jo Jio ke network ko Jammu Kashmir ke side me support nahi kar rahe the sir baki sir aur bhi apart from mere khud ek client hai Jammu Kashmir ke unko matlab Jio ke alawa maine unko add kara hai Airtel aur ya Vodafone to unse chalne laga sir to Jio ke network ke issue se aa raha tha sir IndiaMART ke usme koi dikkat nahi thi ab sir aap dekh rahe honge Jio ne usko resolve kar diya to ab IndiaMART chal raha hai sir.
Customer: [inaudible] koi baat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai baki sir ye aapka jo abhi aapka mail aaya tha to uske wajah se hame concern aaya tha to iski koi abhi hum isko concern ko to close kar sakte hai na sir not working properly jo aapne bheja tha ab to sir aapka IndiaMART chal raha hoga.
Customer: Haan haan kar dijiye kar dijiye.
Executive: Sir theek hai sir baki sir aur koi issue sir buyleads call inquiry me kuch bhi aap mujhe bataiye sir jisme aapko buyleads me lag raha ho koi issue aa raha hai to bataiye mai uspe kaam karta hu sir order quantity ya fir kuch.
Customer: Kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Kuch nahi hai sir theek hai ye concern close kar du sir aapka?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ye jo aapne sir not working properly ka hame concern bheja tha mail bheja tha ise mai close kar du?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye ab close.
Executive: Theek hai aur koi sir Swatika sir aur koi issue?
Customer: Nahi bas thank you.
Executive: Thank you for your time sir agar koi dikkat aati hai sir account manager ka number hai aapke pass?
Customer: Ji ji ji mere pass hai to please sir aap unke message kar sakte hai call kar sakte hai koi bhi issue aa raha hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai thank you sir.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reported IndiaMART was not working.

- Customer mentioned buylead section was closed for 20 days.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed issue was due to Jio network.

- Executive informed the customer issue has been resolved.

- Executive offered assistance with buyleads, calls, inquiries.

- Executive closed the 'not working properly' concern.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- network issue, buyleads, jio, resolution, concern
